website_summaries.verdict: This blaster is high quality, but  it may put a little strain on your lower back if your core isn't strong.
pros: Thick-gauge aluminum, strong rivets, and padded and adjustable nylon belt
Contoured plate keeps back and elbows locked in position
Will change your workout for the better
cons: May put a little strain on your lower back if your core isn't in good shape
This will get better over time and help strengthen your back

customer_reviews.title: Biceps under massive construction
customer_reviews.text: Just got this arm blaster from DMoose Fitness. Straight fire! I love it, it's gone puts some inches on these guns I got already. I'm about to have some missiles. Hahaha
customer_reviews.author: S Reid

customer_reviews.title: “Game Changer!”
customer_reviews.text: Needed a little assistant in my form and this works great. My workout felt different but in a good way. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C. Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Best Arm Blaster on the market, period !
customer_reviews.text: There are many options out there for this type of device, all trying to mimic the original Weider arm blaster, in which I have owned. The DMoose looked and IS as good if not improved from the original, with the heavily reinforced webbing and the heavily padded arm rests. The quality of the aluminum is top notch and strong. Tried it with 100 pound barbell, no problem.Customer service is top notch ! All said, this arm blaster more than lived up to my expectations and I'm glad I chose DMoose. Great company !
customer_reviews.author: scottsg

customer_reviews.title: Makes it easy!
customer_reviews.text: This device has really helped my teen aged son keep his elbows still and closer into his body when doing curls. It makes maintaining correct technique easier and as such the workout is more effective. Its also great quality, I mean its made really well and my son says its comfortable to wear, which means he'll use it! WIN!
customer_reviews.author: Frozen North

customer_reviews.title: You will often be flexing in the mirror from the nasty pump you get.
customer_reviews.text: This piece of equipment allows extreme bicep isolation, you can't go wrong with it. It's very durable and the padding is comfortable. I slammed it in my car door and it came out unscathed. No matter how much weight you're curling it won't flex.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made works great
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I can do bicep curls without straining on the elbow and with greater isolation. I have gained 5lb lift after just a couple of weeks. The bar is comfortable to wear and sturdy. Recommended for all serious fitness people.
customer_reviews.author: Valuable Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that it’s metal and very rigid. The strap and padding are “good enough” but definitely where they skimped on quality. I’m 6’7” with very long arms and was able to adjust this to fit me well. I really like these for bicep curls in my home gym since I don’t have room for a preacher’s curl station. You can isolate your biceps effectively. I also tried lay pulls with this and was very happy with it a for that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Itsme

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Compared to past experiences with this type of accessory, this one didn't compare well at all. The metal was thin, the dimensions were not sufficient for proper use, and the straps....were entirely too thin and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Nikretne

customer_reviews.title: Very effective product!
customer_reviews.text: The product is sturdy, not at all flimsy, and for the most part is comfortable. The only reason I didn't give this 5/5 is because the small buckle to adjust the neck strap seems a little out of tolerance. When adjusting while wearing the arm blaster the buckle came apart. I put it back together and adjusted the length while laying the product on a table, once buckled it holds very well and works great. I can really feel the isolation in my biceps and reduced fatigue in other muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Suede

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product to blast out your biceps.
customer_reviews.text: OMG. My gym actually has one of these, but the adjustable part was broken, then you have to think about everyone else's sweat on your neck, so I got this to have my own, I don't' have to adjust it over and over and know it is mine. Talk about isolating your bicep workout. I use it with the curl bar, dumbbells doing curls, hammer, etc. Blasts the biceps. Keeps your form as you're basically not able to move. Maybe I'm wearing it wrong but when I go heavier, it does tend to put a bit of pull on my neck. I might try adjusting it a bit more but still... LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic cam lock (on neck strap) broke :-/
customer_reviews.text: First, the arm curl blaster is great for isolating your biceps. I would have rated this 5 stars... except the cam lever strap lock is made of plastic, and it broke after a few months. If you buy this item, consider adding a steel cam lock to your order. This one looks like it might work: Strapworks Twocam Metal Cam Double-Sided No-Sew Webbing Buckle - 1 Inch - 2 Pack
customer_reviews.author: BorisTheBlade

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the nicer arm blasters on the market, the neck and elbow padding are just right not to thin and not to bulky. I love the color. The one issue I had is that the clip to tighten and loosen the strap was broken. I would recommend that they just use a simple loop ring fastener they kind they use on some belt buckles. Even with the buckle being broken I was t going to return it just because of that I tied that thing in a knot and hit the gym
customer_reviews.author: Jamahl Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Arm Blaster Generally Needs Functional Movement Improvement
customer_reviews.text: Similar to the leg extension exercise, our legs do not functionally go up and down in a straight line, nor do our arms when using the Arm Blaster. The Arm Blaster needs a Functional Movement improvement by aligning the elbow rests in an outwardly relaxed functional movement and not in an awkwardly counter-productive restrictively painful motion. Otherwise, DMoose is sturdy, made of good quality material, and is a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sheriff N. Osni

customer_reviews.title: It works but would improve materials
customer_reviews.text: It got the job done but I would make a few suggestions for improvement. There was padding where the arms rest, but when lifting heavy the amount of padding is pretty insignificant. I’d recommend the manufacturer at least double the padding for comfort. Also the strap was really flimsy. It’s sturdy enough for basic workouts, but when using heavier weights, the neck pad would fold and it was pretty annoying. Using a sturdier neck pad would really help improve the quality, and the strap felt really flimsy. It didn’t scream great quality but like I said it got the job done
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've never used one of these before, but I'm glad I tried it. It's like having a portable preacher curl bench. The construction is solid, and the padding works well to protect your elbows. If I could change one thing, it would be to make it a little more narrow, or at least give the option to order a narrower one. I'm 5'9" and lean, and it seems like it places my elbows out just a little too far. Not a big deal though; it works great. Highly recommended to prevent poor form and isolate the upper arm.
customer_reviews.author: JasonH

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I fractured 3 vertebrae at the base of my spine last year in an accident at work. Since I've been cleared to go back to working out I've been trying to find ways to get a good workout with as little weight as possible. This thing is great for blasting your biceps. I'm not sure if it's from my back injury or not but I do notice this puts some strain on my mid back but if anything it's helped strength that area. My suggestion to anyone starting with this would definitely be to start with low weight and higher reps until you get comfortable with it. Personally I have loved this.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Keith Faris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a basement gym and needed to add some variation to my exercises. I purchased this to help with that. It's not going to give you 22" arms, but it is a quality product to help you add some variation to your routine. It is made well with a nice adjustable strap. For the price you can't go wrong. They offer color options as well.
customer_reviews.author: WombatSniffer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Arm Blaster
customer_reviews.text: Yes, there are other arm blasters out there charging you double to triple the price of the DMoose, but this is just as good if not superior to the others. This is lightweight and the elbow pads are comfortable. You will definitely get the pump you are looking for while using the proper technique and reduce stress on your back.
customer_reviews.author: CMHWolf

customer_reviews.title: Clip broke
customer_reviews.text: It was nice when it came in, however the clip broke before my husband even got to use it. Big disappointment since this was part of his Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have shoulder issues and before using this product I would have a tendency to use my back and shoulders when doing bicep curls. The curl blaster has isolated my curls to my biceps and elbows which has greatly reduced the pain in my shoulders that often radiated to my back (scapula). Excellent product for isolating your biceps and reducing pain elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Ross1

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: The appliance works very well. Starting to rebuild my home gym. Piece by piece. This is great for someone who may not own a preacher curl machine/bench. Wear this on and adjustable incline bench doing curls and it helps. If takes some “getting use to” because if you haven’t trained in years due to health problems like me, it’s like riding a bicycle again. Take some time. It’s sturdy. Works well. Crafted well.
customer_reviews.author: David Michael Rapp

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it, it is made so well
customer_reviews.text: I use this arm blaster all the time. I absolutely love it, it is made so well. This is something you will not have to replace even after thousands of uses. The quality is remarkable, this is truly one of my most valued items in my gym bag. This company is definitely doing it right. Every time someone comes up to me in the gym asking about it i give it nothing but praise and tell them they need to get one. Thank you DMoose for making such a great product, you have made a life long customer.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Get to the Chopper!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do you want arms like Arnold? Go for it. It's more versatile than just wearing it strapped to your sternum too. You can lay it over the top of a bench and use it just like a standing preacher curl bench. Either way, great way to isolate biceps if you adjust it/use it right and is an awesome alternative to a real curl bench.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Morse

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Well made, light and sturdy. The trick is getting the length right for the correct angle behind your elbows. Once you work that out it is smooth sailing. Or lifting. I have found this to be far more effective for the lighter weight/higher rep works out, as you can generally isolate better (if your form is correct). I think you'll be happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kinimaka

customer_reviews.title: If you are on the fence about buying because of mixed reviews.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Some of the reviews had me worried. But it's well made. I dont know what people are saying about width. I'm 5'9. 235 lbs and it feels fine. Maybe it was just an awkward position for them. You definitely need to drop your usual weight way down. At least at first. The quality is as good as ones I've tried that friends paid close to twice the price. If you are on the fence about buying. Get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Emerson

customer_reviews.title: D,moose arm blaster important tool in my workouts.
customer_reviews.text: The arm blaster allows my to safely and effective do arm curls, without hurting or straining my lower back. It lets my do curls in a safe, precise movement. The end result is bigger arms and definition, without straining my lower back. D'moose fitness's arm blaster is well constructed and a great value. I use this product daily, and absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a Man-Sized product tight fit
customer_reviews.text: This product is made for 13 yr olds. Or maybe for people who haven’t developed muscles yet. Experienced lifters such as myself will not fit into this product. I don’t use it anymore, I donated it to the local Boy Scouts. Next time they should design this around actual weightlifters.
customer_reviews.author: Baron Richard Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better seller
customer_reviews.text: The product does exactly what the description professes! I can't speak for gains as I.ve only used it for a short period, however, you can absolutely feel how it isolates the muscles. Had a minor issue with the first one and D'Moose took care of it right away. Great product, even better seller.
customer_reviews.author: ProCom

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: First one I bought the plastic clasp when adjusting had broke at one of the hinges. Dmoose’s customer service did an amazing job getting me a new one very quickly and I am very pleased with how well it works! Went up to about 100lb preacher curls and it handled it like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Not a safe practice
customer_reviews.text: This is not a safe practice. All this does is hurt your shoulder more than building your biceps. Do some research and u will know how bad these are for your shoulders. If u look like arnold may be it's for you. But for regular fitness people stay away from this
customer_reviews.author: Shanmuga

customer_reviews.title: Good all round
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and good quality etc. Couldn’t give 5 stars as the holding strap would slip down unless I rigged it by putting the end back into the strap adjuster buckle. Plus I like a little more depth for my arm blasters so I bent the bend a little deeper for better fit for me also .
customer_reviews.author: loren asher burton stick

customer_reviews.title: DMoose keep doing you’re thing
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product. You can definitely feel the insane pump from it especially when you go slow and controlled. But the cost is great and its a new company starting up. Their service is amazing and it came a couple days before expected to. They emailed me before the product was sent and about a week after i received it, just to check how it was working. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Payton

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like it great pump on your arms. Helps you keep proper form. Your not going to pick up the same amount of weight you use to with this but what you do pick up works great. Arms felt really pumped after workout and very tired as well. Got to get use to it feel weird at first
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but smaller than others I’ve owned and smaller than I expected. Can still use because quality is good, but if you are over 6’ and over 225 pounds, not quite wide enough (it’s a muscle, not a fat thing).
customer_reviews.author: w8liftn

customer_reviews.title: It's Great
customer_reviews.text: This DMoose Arm Blaster is pretty much perfect...or as perfect as an arm blaster can be. Very well made. The metal is very sturdy. I curl quite a bit and it has never flexed once. The padding for the neck is very comfortable. The strap is very easy to adjust. Even the paint seems thick, fairly scratch resistant, and good quality. All around I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AnthemDBA

customer_reviews.title: BACK TO THE 80s
customer_reviews.text: Been lifting weights since the 80s. Remember using this ball them so I thought I'd get one for my son. It's a lot harder than I remember it but I'm sure it will serve its purpose for my son well. Very happy just wish I could do what I use to do in the 80s
customer_reviews.author: RaiderLee

customer_reviews.title: Blast Those Biceps Baby!
customer_reviews.text: This Bicep blaster is the real deal right here. It has a great price and it does its job wonderfully. Ive seen a increase in my bicep size in less than a week after using it (not kidding). The tricky part is just dinding the right height adjustment for your arm placement but once you figure it out BOOM! Your biceps are ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: KoolKris

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and works just like they say. My only issue is that when you EZ Curl more than 120 LBS it puts alot of strain on lower back.....but its not their fault. Alternating curls are best for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: It dose what it sopose to do,but there is not enough padding for your arms,so its uncomfortable, and the padding fell off the first day. I would've have given it a five stars, if the padding was more supportive, and stayed on.
customer_reviews.author: Bodyfixx

customer_reviews.title: Can curl as heavy as you want!
customer_reviews.text: Love this arm blaster. I love to go heavy so arm blasters in the past seem to bend as time goes on from the heavy weight. I've had this a year putting in a lot of heavy weight on it and its still like new.
customer_reviews.author: BaeBruh 💪

customer_reviews.title: Kills gains
customer_reviews.text: Its extremely uncomfortable regardless how much its adjusted. I get it it's not supposed to be comfortable for gains but this is just really not good, tried it with dumbbells and ez bar and this is just not a well designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Tulio S

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful accessory to compliment my workouts and weightlifting. I am a medium sized female, and this works for me. It is large enough to accommodate a large male, and small enough to accommodate me. No frills or whistles. Just what you need to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Broken clasp
customer_reviews.text: Opened this from the box and the first thing I noticed was it is much heavier than other models I’ve used. Despite that I tried it on to adjust to my body frame and that’s when I noticed I received a broken product. The adjustment clip on the neck line had a broken clasp that wouldn’t latch. Have to return. A disappointment considering the rating I saw online...
customer_reviews.author: Greg C.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Quality seemed ok. Didn't really do anything for me other than dig into my chest while doing curls. You can pretty much get the same effect keeping your back and elbows up against a wall. Ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: Rodo

customer_reviews.title: Nice arm blaster
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s suppose to, feels sturdy using it.. I definitely feel like I’m using a more proper form and can see the results starting to show from it. Good addition to your arms workout.
customer_reviews.author: Boston222

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband who is big into lifting weights. He has used it several times and has had no problems with it. He says he can feel the "burn". I'll update if anything changes..... 5 stars as of now
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Does change how you would do your curls, but I think it's a bit tricky to find a good way to use it while avoiding hurting your backneck. Everybody will has an own solution to this, but do be ware of that danger.
customer_reviews.author: Quantitative Z

customer_reviews.title: Dont like it
customer_reviews.text: Cant get it to a spot that is comfortable to use and doesnt feel any better than a regular curl.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with this arm blaster is the plastic strap adjustment clip. It does not hold the strap well and will slip sometimes while I'm lifting. Would recommend this part be replaced by something more reliable. Other than that, everything is great! Fit is comfortable and it does a great job isolating the bicep!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Thin strap. Thin arm padding. Too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap thin straps. Thin padding and poor coverage for back of arms. Too narrow (not designed for wide/broad shoulder people). Just cheap and not very functional compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Phillippe

customer_reviews.title: If you are a large weight lifter, go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Much wider than other arm blasters. Uncomfortable while using. I have to pad the back with a towel as it presses against my chest. Feels like I hyper extended my left arm after recently using. Too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Barfield

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The arm blaster sits a little wide for me. I am a narrow person though. It fits my son very well and he likes it. Holds his arms in place perfectly while he curls.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product.. I would prefer a different neck cushion. Something washable. After alot of use, i feel like it will begin to deteriorate. Update will be posted.
customer_reviews.author: Malone

customer_reviews.title: Great muscle isolation
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves this, its one of his favorite workout accessories. It challenges you more when curls are not enough. Does a great job at isolating the biceps.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Angle is in the wrong direction and creates a terrible pinching effect on triceps area
customer_reviews.text: Angle is in the wrong direction and creates a terrible pinching effect on triceps area. I have since turned it upside down and reversed the hang around my neck at which point the bend angle is perfect, but I have to roll it up to achieve this position. It works... sort of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For tiny people
customer_reviews.text: Bad thing is I am not that huge. Its still to small. I had to bend it to get it where my elbows sit remotely close to where they need to be. I replaced the padding also with some better neoprene. Only plus side is its still cheaper to buy this than forge the metal myself. Customer service was helpfulw
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ratzlaff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: This company is the best! Very very prompt excellent product, if everything was made with this quality and the quality of customer service this world would be a happier place! Top notch in all aspects. I made an error myself and they corrected it immediately! Five stars is not enough! More like a top 100 company. Kudos to this amazing product and the amazing company!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Really Makes You Work For Your Gains
customer_reviews.text: I was having a lot of trouble in terms of gaining any muscle on my biceps or even feeling any soreness. I was getting tired of it and i decided to do some research. I came across this item and I haven't regretted it. People look at me weird in the gym, but i don't care. I wanted to work on my arms and its such a great pump for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Naraine

customer_reviews.title: A nice piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I've never used an arm blaster before so I have nothing to compare it to. It works great to isolate biceps and maintain good form while curling. The aluminum is thick and very rigid. It is well made and seems very durable. I would recommend buying this if you don't have room for a preacher bench.
customer_reviews.author: Small Pizza

customer_reviews.title: a must have
customer_reviews.text: Helps a lot, highly recommended! its easier to lift weight with it, with every rep you're doing it hits the bisep. Normaly i do 15 reps and feel q little pump, but with this thing i do ten and my bicep its super sore
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This arm blaster is solidly constructed, no bend like the cheaper brands such a "weider" I have previously owned. Customer service got right back to me and went above and beyond. I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: S. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Good for strict reps, but high weight is uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to get used to this. Feels uncomfortable with pressure of it pressing into upper stomach area. Tried using with 105lbs on 7ft bar and was very uncomfortable. Used with 65lbs on curl bar and was more manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Old School Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Is sturdy and light very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: So far happy to get this is easy to use and sturdy and value for money and material can’t complain write now so I give a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Rm Gac

customer_reviews.title: Forced form
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly solid construction, yet very comfortable. The neck straps locks into place avoiding slipping during use, like many other manufacturers do. I'm very happy with my purshace. This is my second and not last Dmoose product. Knee wraps are also excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Ode2nick

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the product. I would change the plastic strap to something more durable like steal.? The plastic clasp doesn't lock if you put too much pressure on it. But over all its a good solid piece of equipment that does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Appropriate for the biceps
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and has said this product is very good as it is helpful, easy to use and appropriate for the biceps.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R.

customer_reviews.title: American AF
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike a out this product is when I play guitar on it between sets it doesn't play "Ain't that American". Great quality and I'm a bigger guy at 210# and no more problems at all. If it worked for Arnold it's good enough for me!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy and built to support and last. Looking to Chang up your routine and maximize size, this is a great addition toy your gym.
customer_reviews.author: Jay McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer! This made working out much easier. I’ve been able to work out longer and build greater mass.
customer_reviews.author: JJPM2

customer_reviews.title: Its good, but read my review
customer_reviews.text: Its great, but when you are lifting the adjusting clip is not strong enough to hold it where you want, so i figured my lenght and zip tied it. 🤷🏻‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: TacSteve

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This product is strong and durable. I read of many other arm blasters bending under 80+ lbs of weight during barbell curls. I’ve curled 105 barbell with this product and it holds! The strap holds tight but only time will tell how long it will last
customer_reviews.author: AlexG

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, great product
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is excellent.... Top notch. Had issue with the first unit, the D Moose team immediately jumped in and replaced it. The new one is quite comfortable and perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jon M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you use it upside down.
customer_reviews.text: Over all I like the product. Quick adjustments with the strap clasp is easy. Materials feel durable. ONE DRAWBACK: It feels wrong you use it the way its constructed. Feels better when I wear it backwards and flip it up to do curls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pump is real !!
customer_reviews.text: Good Product... feels good. I am 5'8 190 lbs pretty muscular, and fits me well. I have plenty of room on the adjusting strap if i was taller. Makes you use 100% of your bicep with no cheating, also good with hammer curls. Typically when i do hammer curls, the tendon in my left forearm hurts. But because this puts all the focus on your bicep my tendon has not been hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Best pump ever.
customer_reviews.text: Company shopped it WAY faster than I thought and I actually didn’t have to rearrange my schedule to make sure I hit back and biceps with this. It gives you the NASTIEST pump ever 🤘🏼 You can isolate your biceps so much better than any other workout
customer_reviews.author: Hollis Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who’s always looking for new gym gadgets. He loves this he said he notices a difference in arm day when he uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice arm blaster
customer_reviews.text: It was nice but im a big guy and it was too narrow for me but sturdy and well built. It should work well for most people.
customer_reviews.author: .eagle fire

customer_reviews.title: Measure elbow too elbow
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice product but its wider than I expected. Making it not as effective and harder to keep form.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Warning my have to get new shirts.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for over a month now my holsters dont hold my guns anymore. My arms have grown over and inch and now I have to buy new shirts. It makes you not cheat and wing the weights. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: John210

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the original Weider product that I had in the 90s. Straps are ok the support material behind the neck is terrible. If you use this product as often as I do you'll have to modify it with neopran material
customer_reviews.author: Nate Porlas

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Not a very complicated item, quick delivery. Does everything I need it to, sturdy and well built. Recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cole

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy the support I get while using this product
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the support I get while using this product. The neck strap could be thicker and more comfortable, it feels a little cheap but other than that, solid product. A lot of guys on my ship are begging to borrow it when they see me with it at the gym
customer_reviews.author: R-Tava

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my workout.
customer_reviews.text: Great for isolating your biceps. If you feel that the bicep work you are doing just isn't getting the job one then I suggest you give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it for one bicep workout so far, but it worked exactly as intended. My arms were very sore the next day. Start light, as it makes you use perfect form & you could hurt yourself if you go too heavy too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good. Simple. Could be even better...
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a pad on the part that pushes into your chest. Gets really uncomfortable digging into your ribs as you increase in weight. Other than that a solid product that does what its advertised to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Never owned one before. Its one of the best pieces of equipment I now own.
customer_reviews.author: James V. Blecha

customer_reviews.title: Good arm blaster
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Definitely gets the job done and is pretty comfortable compared to other arm blasters that I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal to keep a focus on the arms and to feel the burn
customer_reviews.author: toni h graves

customer_reviews.title: Half the weight twice the results.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have learned about this years ago. One thing that surprised me was how simple the concept is. The results from the few times I've used it is unbelievable. I'm using half the weight with twice the results.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Amborski

customer_reviews.title: You get what your looking for
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Looks and functions as described. No need to pay more
customer_reviews.author: James Pohlman

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Great craftsmanship, smooth beveled edges all around and padding is just enough to make it comfortable for heavier lifts.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful arm blaster
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product for an arm blaster. Construction is better than my last arm blaster as it relates to the neck strap. It is adjustable, has a comfortable neck pad, pads for your elbows and looks great...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, I've been using it for about a week now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, sturdy arm blaster
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good product, it makes the arms stay in place for a better bicep movement with your exercise. Easy to use and adjust. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yarim Gazel

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: It'll take getting used to but seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dwbid42

customer_reviews.title: Needs better clip for strap.
customer_reviews.text: Came with chips in it and glue exposed. Also everytime I use it, the clip does not hold the strap, and it slides and lossens between sets.
customer_reviews.author: MDG

customer_reviews.title: IMPROVED VERSION OF THE JOE WEIDER ARM BLASTER
customer_reviews.text: This is an improved version of the old Joe Weider arm blaster. The strap is connected sturdier and the neoprene padding on the ends and the strap make it much more comfortable while working out.
customer_reviews.author: Buukowski

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and the construction is good quality. The strap and pad are great. I’m 6’ 3”, 200lbs and it’s a perfect size and fit. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Skynet Global Defense System

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Best buy for my home gym this year! A great find for the money and the quality
customer_reviews.author: Decaturranger

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This rocks! You can lift much heavier because you can't "swing" the weight and you get full extension.
customer_reviews.author: Porter L.

product_meta.title: DMoose Fitness Arm Curl Blaster for Bicep Body Building and Muscle Strength Gains, Contoured and Adjustable Isolate for Curling and Weightlifting, Well Balanced Support
feature_bullets: TARGET AND ISOLATE BICEP MUSCLES: Designed to enhance your barbell and dumbbell curls this arm curl blaster helps create stronger, more well defined bicep muscles by locking elbows into place and keeping them from swaying during lifts.

STRENGTHEN ARMS, SHOULDERS, AND BACK: This bicep curl blaster is ideal for body builders, weightlifters, or even CrossFit athletes who want to get stronger arms, biceps, and shoulders which creates strength gains for other common movements.

CONTOURED, ADJUSTABLE DESIGN: Created by fitness experts our curling blaster features thick padded elbow pads and foam neck padding to improve safety and comfort, as well as a fully adjustable strap to support men or women lifters.

LONG TERM STABILITY AND RESILIENCE: Superior to standard bicep blasters that break down after regular use we’ve used thick gauge aluminum, strong rivets, and an adjustable nylon belt to improve your stability and enhance gear durability.

GENUINE LIFETIME GUARANTEE: Here at DMoose we believe in creating durable, long lasting fitness products that support every rep, workout, and goal, which is why every product is backed by a full refund or replacement guarantee.
